name: EXT_DATA_LAST_DONE
description: This table stores the user and instant for the last time each external data type was marked as Done in Reconcile Outside Information.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: EXTALG_D_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that external allergies were last marked as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTALG_D_USER_ID
columns.description: User who last marked external allergies as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTALG_D_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EXTMED_D_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that external medications were last marked as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTMED_D_USER_ID
columns.description: User who last marked external medications as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTMED_D_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EXTPRB_D_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that external problems were last marked as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTPRB_D_USER_ID
columns.description: User who last marked external problems as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTPRB_D_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EXTIMM_D_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that external immunizations were last marked as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTIMM_D_USER_ID
columns.description: User who last marked external immunizations as reviewed.

columns.name: EXTIMM_D_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EXTIMM_Q_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant (UTC) when external immunizations were last queried.
